# valueDescription

**Instance Property**

The description that all sequence elements must match.

## Declaration

```swift
var valueDescription: MLFeatureDescription { get }
```

## Accessing the constraints

- **countRange**: The range of values allowed for the sequence’s length.

items.description: The range of values allowed for the sequence’s length.
items.name: countRange
